### PEF 썰전 (**`r now`**) [Link](https://www.hankyung.com/tag/PEF%EC%8D%B0%EC%A0%84?page=1)

```{r}
# date.search <- "20210811"
date.search <- format(Sys.time(), "%Y%m%d")

Stack <- NULL

for(i in 1:10){
  URL <- str_c("https://www.hankyung.com/tag/PEF%EC%8D%B0%EC%A0%84?page=", "i")
  
  res <- read_html(URL)
  pattern <- ".txt a"
  title <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_text()
  
  pattern <- ".time"
  date <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_text()
  
  pub.date <- str_sub(date, 1, 10)
  
  pattern <-
    "#container > div.contents_wrap > div.contents > div.news_list_wrap > ul:nth-child(1) > li > div.txt > h3 > a"
  
  link <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_attr("href")
  
  tab <- cbind(pub.date, title, link) %>% as_tibble()
  
  Stack <- rbind(Stack, tab)
  
}


df <- Stack %>%
  mutate(title.link = cell_spec(title, "html", link = link, color="#062872")) %>%
  select(pub.date, title.link)

names(df) <- c("Date", "Headline")

df %>% head(length(title)) %>%
  kable(format="html", escape=FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
```

### 마켓인사이트 (**`r now`**) [Link](https://marketinsight.hankyung.com/freenews?page=1)

```{r}
# date.search <- "20210811"
date.search <- format(Sys.time(), "%Y%m%d")

Stack <- NULL

for(i in 1:5){
  URL <-
    str_c("https://marketinsight.hankyung.com/freenews?page=", i)
  
  res <- read_html(URL)
  pattern <- ".news-tit a"
  title <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_text()
  
  pattern <-
    "#contents > div > div > div.cont-free > ul > li > div.txt-cont > h3 > a"
  
  date <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_attr("href")
  
  pub.date <-
    str_c(str_sub(date, 38, 41),
          ".",
          str_sub(date, 42, 43),
          ".",
          str_sub(date, 44, 45))
  
  
  pattern <- "#contents > div > div > div.cont-free > ul > li > div.txt-cont > h3 > a"
  
  link <- res %>%
    html_nodes(pattern) %>%
    html_attr("href") %>%
    str_c("https:", .)
  
  
  tab <- cbind(pub.date, title, link) %>% as_tibble()  
  
  Stack <- rbind(Stack, tab)
  
  Sys.sleep(1)
  
}


df <- Stack %>%
  mutate(title.link = cell_spec(title, "html", link = link, color="#062872")) %>%
  select(pub.date, title.link)

names(df) <- c("Date", "Headline")

df %>% head(length(title)) %>%
  kable(format="html", escape=FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
```
